trans_title: 升华的音乐: 纪念费伦茨•弗里乔伊
introduction: In 1963, there occurred the tragically early death - at the age of 49 - of the outstanding conductor, Ferenc Fricsay. Had he livered longer, the general consensus is that he would have featured alongside Herbert von Karajan and Leonard Bernstein as one of the greatest practitioners of the conductor's art in the second half of the 20th century. Indeed, a Munich critic went further, remarking that Fricsay's talent and style had represented nothing less than the continuation of the legacy of Arturo Toscanini.1963 年，杰出的指挥家费伦茨·弗里乔伊 (Ferenc Fricsay) 不幸早逝，享年 49 岁。 如果他活得更长一些，普遍的共识是他将与赫伯特·冯·卡拉扬和伦纳德·伯恩斯坦并列，成为 20 世纪下半叶指挥艺术最伟大的实践者之一。 事实上，一位慕尼黑评论家走得更远，他评论说，弗里乔伊的才华和风格无非是阿图罗·托斯卡尼尼 (Arturo Toscanini) 遗产的延续。
